title: Anywhere Except The Bedroom
itunes:title: Anywhere Except The Bedroom
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I truly need your advice on this one. I’m 28 years old and so is my girlfriend. We have been together six months and I really like her, but lately I think she’s lost her darn mind. She has a crazy new habit that’s very embarrassing and illegal. I don’t want to lose her, so I’ve been going along with it. She likes to have sex a lot and that’s fine with me, but she has become obsessed with having sex in public places. It started a month ago when we went to see a movie...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
